speaker: NARRATOR
text: Watch what happens this time when the youth minister allows the team to tell his story  and guides him to consider how his drinking could interfere with his goals and to think  about how he might benefit from making a change.

speaker: NARRATOR
text: This time the youth ministry began by expressing concern but relied on open questions and reflective listening to build rapport and encourage Tommy to share his experiences.

speaker: NARRATOR
text: Tommy provided a great deal of useful information regarding his drinking very quickly which set the stage for a more productive conversation.

speaker: NARRATOR
text: By exploring both sides of the issue, Tommy was given the opportunity to open up without fear of condemnation and was also able to admit to some of the consequences of his drinking.

speaker: NARRATOR
text: This gave him the chance to consider the reasons he might benefit from making a change.

speaker: NARRATOR
text: The youth minister also encouraged Tommy to look ahead to consider how his drinking could affect his future plans.

speaker: NARRATOR
text: By exploring his values and relating them to his drinking, she developed a discrepancy between his future goals and his current behaviors, highlighting the need to make some adjustments to his drinking.

speaker: NARRATOR
text: Using a summary, the youth minister was able to transition smoothly to a discussion of options and Tommy identified a realistic goal for himself that matched his values.

speaker: NARRATOR
text: As a result, he is much more likely to follow through on his plans and actually make a change in his drinking.
